titleStmt.title: A conference held between the old Lord Protector and the new Lord General, truly reported by Hugh Peters.

notesStmt.note: A satire in the form of a dialogue between Cromwell, Monk and Peters.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 19. 1659."; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproductions of the originals in the Huntington Library and the British Library.
